Regulation Name(s): Alkaline phosphatase or isoenzymes test system
Lactate dehydrogenase (NAD reduction/NADH oxidation) test system
Analyzer, Chemistry (Photometric, Discrete), For Clinical Use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACE Axcel Clinical Chemistry System with alkaline phosphatase, amylase, and LDH-L reagents for quantitative enzymatic determinations in serum and other fluids
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of alkaline phosphatase, amylase, and lactate dehydrogenase activities in serum using the ACE Axcel Clinical Chemistry System to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of liver, bone, parathyroid, intestinal, pancreatic, cardiac, and certain tumor diseases; for in vitro diagnostic use in clinical and physician office laboratories.
